title: Technical SEO Training
headline: Master the technical side of search engine optimisation with this free online SEO training course taught by Blue Array.
description: This training course from industry leaders Blue Array takes a deep dive into the ins and outs of the technical side of search engine optimisation (SEO). We explain step by step how to change language on websites to make them easier for consumers to find. This course is a great starting point for anyone who wants to turn their technical skills into an exciting and in-demand career. Sign up to look under the hood of online content and master SEO.

courseDescription:
This course provides a high-level view of the technical side of search engine optimisation (SEO) and lays out a number of jargon terms and definitions. We then explore a wide range of important topics such as images, internal linking and ‘crawling’ technology (which includes a module created by our friends at Sitebulb).

The course then investigates deeper aspects of technical SEO, including accessibility and security. Within each topic, we’ll cover basic and advanced concepts and provide the opportunity to test your knowledge with periodic quizzes. Each module has been designed to offer the best possible knowledge on which to base further learning and breaks complicated, technical processes down into easy-to-understand steps.

This SEO training course has been created by the experienced technical team at Blue Array with a wide audience in mind as it combines an introductory overview with deeper level analysis. In today's global digitised economy, competition for online attention is fierce so this course teaches you how to work with websites to make them easier for consumers to find with various search engines. Sign up to master SEO and add a useful new skill to your professional portfolio.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This first module of the Technical SEO Training sets the scene for the course by focusing on some high-level topics, that are required for the best understanding of the remainder of this course such as how search works from a technical perspective and crawling technology.
topics: Introduction to the Course and Technical SEO
A Technical View of How Search Works

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This second module within the Technical SEO Training covers more advanced topics within this core area. The topics covered within will help you build on the understanding that has been developed within the first module of this course. We’ll touch on Page Experience, Schema, Status codes, Content, and On-Page signals.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This is the third and final module within this Technical SEO Training. Here, we cover some more advanced technical topics. These will build on the previous modules, and you’ll be able to run your own technical audit by the end! We’ll touch on Crawlability, Images, Security, and Accessibility.
